about_the_game:
Are you afraid of spiders?, then this game is not for you. You will feel like a resident of Australia. There are more spiders in this country than stars in the universe. The spiders here are huge and each of them wants to bite you in the ass.

In this game you will have to get out of mazes filled with spiders. There are 12 mazes in total, each of which has its own level of difficulty. At the exit of the maze there is a door, to open which you need to have 7 keys scattered throughout the maze. You must collect them all.

Movement wastes your energy, which needs to be replenished, so collect fruits and eat them.
Try to avoid collisions with spiders. When confronted, the spider bites you, reduce your health and inflicting a negative effect. There are many of these effects, each of them reduces your abilities and prevents you from surviving. To dispel the negative effect, you need to drink the appropriate antidote.

If you get to the 10th maze, you can consider yourself a real Australian.
But only a few will be able to go further.

name: Australian maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
